title: Podcast #043 – Panaracer’s Jeff Zell talks tread design, going all in on Gravel
content:
If you’re in the industry, chances are pretty good you know Jeff Zell, Panaracer’s go-to guy for, well, just about everything, really. So he’s the perfect guest to talk about how Panaracer went from one of the earliest brands making legit mountain bike tires, to leaping into the gravel bike category and owning it for […]

The post Podcast #043 – Panaracer’s Jeff Zell talks tread design, going all in on Gravel appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
